title: Front End Development Internship in Bangalore, Ahmedabad (Hybrid)
description:
As a Front End Development intern at Gharpayy, you will have the opportunity to work with cutting\\-edge technologies such as JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, REST API, and Node.js. You will be a key player in creating user\\-friendly interfaces for our innovative products, contributing to the overall success of the company.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design and develop user interfaces for web applications.
* Implement front end solutions that are high\\-performing, efficient, and scalable.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and responsiveness.
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
* Work closely with back\\-end developers to integrate front\\-end components with server\\-side logic.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date on emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously improve our front\\-end development processes.
* Conduct thorough testing and troubleshooting to ensure a seamless user experience.


 If you are a motivated and skilled front\\-end developer looking to gain hands\\-on experience in a fast\\-paced environment, apply now to join our dynamic team at Gharpayy!
   

  

 About Company: Gharpayy, by Surge Ventures, offers safe and healthy rental accommodations for urban millennials, ensuring the highest hygiene standards through stringent cleanliness measures. Designed for a perfect work\\-play balance, our thoughtfully crafted interiors make every moment enjoyable. Backed by Surge Ventures' expertise, which has successfully executed thousands of digital marketing and growth campaigns to drive leads, calls, transactions, and website traffic, Gharpayy combines comfort with innovation for a seamless living experience.

title: Javascript Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Cognizant is a global leader in providing information technology, consulting, and business process outsourcing services. Established with a focus on delivering innovative solutions, Cognizant has built a reputation for helping organizations navigate the complexities of digital transformation. With a presence in over 40 countries and a diverse workforce of talented professionals, the company is committed to driving growth and creating value for its clients across various industries including healthcare, banking, retail, and manufacturing. Cognizant's core mission is to enable clients to stay ahead in a rapidly evolving technological landscape by leveraging cutting\\-edge technologies and industry best practices.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a dedicated and skilled professional to join our team as a Senior Software Engineer. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high\\-quality software solutions that meet our clients' needs. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to deliver innovative products and services, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance. The ideal candidate will possess strong technical expertise, problem\\-solving skills, and a passion for continuous learning. As a key member of our development team, you will contribute to the full software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment and support, while adhering to best practices and industry standards.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should have a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. A minimum of 5 years of experience in software development, with proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C\\#, or Python. Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is preferred. Strong understanding of software development methodologies, including Agile and Scrum, is essential. Candidates should possess excellent problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work effectively in a team environment. Knowledge of database management systems, RESTful APIs, and DevOps practices will be advantageous. Relevant certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect or Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate are a plus.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Design, develop, and implement scalable software solutions in alignment with client requirements and industry best practices. Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including project managers, business analysts, and other developers to deliver high\\-quality products on time. Write clean, efficient, and well\\-documented code that adheres to coding standards and security protocols. Conduct code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure optimal performance and reliability of applications. Participate in requirement analysis and provide technical guidance during project planning. Maintain and improve existing applications by troubleshooting issues and implementing enhancements. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously improve development processes and solutions.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Cognizant offers a competitive compensation package along with comprehensive benefits to support the well\\-being and professional growth of its employees. Benefits include health insurance, retirement plans, paid time off, and flexible working arrangements. Employees also have access to ongoing training and development programs, career advancement opportunities, and a collaborative work environment that fosters innovation and creativity. The company emphasizes work\\-life balance and provides resources to support employee wellness and engagement. Additionally, Cognizant encourages a culture of diversity and inclusion, ensuring all employees feel valued and empowered to contribute their best.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Cognizant is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. Our hiring practices are designed to ensure fairness and equal opportunity for all qualified candidates. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our ability to serve our clients effectively and drives innovation within our organization.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Turing is a leading organization based in San Francisco, California, dedicated to accelerating frontier artificial intelligence (AI) research and deployment. As a trusted partner for global enterprises, Turing specializes in transforming cutting\\-edge AI research into reliable, scalable, and impactful products. The company's core mission is to support AI labs and organizations by providing high\\-quality data, advanced training pipelines, and access to top\\-tier AI researchers with expertise spanning software engineering, logical reasoning, STEM, multilinguality, multimodality, and autonomous agents. Turing’s innovative approach combines research acceleration with enterprise application, enabling clients to convert AI proof of concepts into proprietary, operational systems that deliver measurable business results. With a focus on reliability, security, and scalability, Turing is at the forefront of AI development, fostering a collaborative environment that pushes the boundaries of technological possibilities.
   

  

**About The Role**
 The role at Turing is for experienced Full Stack Software Engineers who are passionate about building end\\-to\\-end AI\\-driven applications for the US market. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work on backend services, web frontends, and evaluation tooling that directly contribute to frontier AI projects. As part of the team, you will be instrumental in designing, developing, and deploying production\\-quality features using Python and modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks. Your work will involve designing and executing model evaluations, scoring outputs, and documenting the rationale behind AI decisions to ensure transparency and reliability. You will collaborate closely with researchers to build and maintain datasets for supervised fine\\-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF), creating feedback loops that enhance model performance. This role is fully remote, offering high flexibility to work from anywhere and on your own schedule, making it ideal for engineers seeking a dynamic, impactful, and autonomous work environment.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess strong technical skills and relevant experience, including proficiency in Python and modern JavaScript/TypeScript. You should have a proven track record of writing clean, reusable, and well\\-tested code, with experience in full\\-stack development. Familiarity with Node.js or NestJS, coupled with a modern frontend framework such as React, Angular, or Vue, is essential. Candidates should have a solid understanding of modular and scalable application design, emphasizing testing, test\\-driven development (TDD), security best practices, and performance optimization. Excellent communication skills are necessary to collaborate asynchronously with a diverse, global engineering team, primarily in English. A background in AI or machine learning is a plus but not mandatory, provided you have a strong foundation in software engineering principles and a keen interest in frontier AI projects.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Full Stack Software Engineer at Turing, your responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Developing and maintaining well\\-structured Python and JavaScript/TypeScript codebases to support AI workflows and full\\-stack web applications.
* Designing, implementing, and executing comprehensive model evaluations, scoring outputs, and documenting the rationales behind AI decisions to ensure transparency.
* Building, maintaining, and improving datasets for supervised fine\\-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF), establishing effective feedback loops with research teams.
* Participating in code reviews, testing, and performance/security enhancements to uphold high\\-quality standards across all projects.
* Collaborating asynchronously with a global team of engineers and researchers to deliver innovative AI solutions and ensure seamless integration of components.
* Contributing to the continuous improvement of development processes, tools, and best practices to optimize productivity and product reliability.


**Benefits**
 Turing offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support the well\\-being and professional growth of its employees. This includes the flexibility to work remotely from any location, enabling a healthy work\\-life balance tailored to individual needs. Employees have the opportunity to work on high\\-impact projects that are at the forefront of AI research, contributing to products with global significance. The company fosters a collaborative and innovative environment, encouraging continuous learning and skill development. Additionally, Turing provides competitive compensation packages, opportunities for career advancement, and access to a network of top\\-tier AI professionals. By working at Turing, employees gain unique exposure to frontier AI technologies and the chance to shape the future of artificial intelligence applications worldwide.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Turing is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse work environment. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. We believe that a diverse team fosters innovation and drives better outcomes, and we welcome applicants from all backgrounds to join us in our mission to advance frontier AI research and applications.

title: Java Full Stack Developer
description:
A Java Full Stack Developer with React JS, JavaScript, and Spring Boot is a software engineer skilled in both frontend and backend development, capable of building complete web applications from user interfaces to server\\-side logic.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop responsive and user\\-friendly frontend applications using React JS.
* Build robust backend services with Spring Boot, including RESTful APIs.
* Integrate frontend and backend seamlessly to create a full\\-stack web application.
* Implement security features such as user authentication, authorization, and secure data handling.
* Manage databases, perform CRUD operations, and ensure data integrity.
* Use version control systems like Git to collaborate and maintain code quality.
* Deploy and maintain applications in production environments.


**Requirements**
* Looking for Senior full stack developer with minimum of 6\\+years of experience
* Frontend: React JS (a JavaScript library for building dynamic user interfaces), JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Bootstrap for styling.
* Backend: Java with Spring Boot framework to create RESTful APIs, handle business logic, and manage data persistence.
* Security: Spring Security for authentication and authorization, often using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for securing REST APIs.
* Database: Experience with relational databases like MySQL or NoSQL databases like MongoDB, using Spring Data JPA or similar for data access.
* Tools: IntelliJ IDEA, VS Code, Maven, NPM, Postman, Git for version control, and CI/CD pipelines for deployment.


**Nice to have**
* Knowledge of API design and implementation (REST) and at least theoretical understanding of AWS concepts


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Data Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 LTIMindtree is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that partners with leading enterprises to deliver innovative solutions that drive growth and efficiency. With a rich history of over two decades, LTIMindtree specializes in providing end\\-to\\-end services across various industries including banking and financial services, insurance, manufacturing, retail, and more. The company is committed to fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment, leveraging cutting\\-edge technologies to solve complex business challenges. LTIMindtree’s focus on continuous learning and development ensures that its employees stay ahead in the rapidly evolving digital landscape, making it a preferred destination for talented professionals seeking impactful careers.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled professional to join our team as a Software Engineer. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing software solutions that meet our clients’ needs. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to analyze requirements, develop high\\-quality code, and ensure the seamless integration of new features. The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical foundation, excellent problem\\-solving skills, and the ability to work effectively in a fast\\-paced environment. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work on innovative projects, contribute to digital transformation initiatives, and grow your expertise within a dynamic organization dedicated to excellence and continuous improvement.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 To be considered for this role, candidates should possess a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. A minimum of 2\\-4 years of professional experience in software development is preferred. Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C\\#, Python, or JavaScript is essential. Familiarity with modern development frameworks, cloud platforms, and agile methodologies will be advantageous. Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment are critical. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, are necessary to effectively interact with clients and team members. Candidates should demonstrate a proactive approach to learning and a passion for technology innovation.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The successful candidate will be responsible for the following key duties:
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain scalable software applications in alignment with project requirements.
* Collaborate with business analysts, project managers, and other developers to gather and analyze user requirements.
* Write clean, efficient, and well\\-documented code following best practices and coding standards.
* Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and methodologies.
* Assist in the deployment and integration of new software solutions into existing systems.
* Maintain technical documentation and provide support for troubleshooting and issue resolution.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies to enhance technical capabilities.


**Benefits**
 LTIMindtree offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support the well\\-being and professional growth of its employees. This includes competitive salary packages, performance\\-based incentives, and health insurance coverage. Employees have access to ongoing training and development programs, mentorship opportunities, and certifications to advance their careers. The company promotes a healthy work\\-life balance through flexible working arrangements and wellness initiatives. Additionally, LTIMindtree encourages a collaborative and inclusive culture, recognizing and rewarding innovation, dedication, and excellence. Employees also benefit from a vibrant community environment that fosters networking, learning, and career advancement.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 LTIMindtree is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and do not discriminate based on race, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our ability to serve our clients effectively and fosters a culture of innovation and mutual respect. title: IQE_INDORE_Hiring
description:
Playwright with Typescript, Service Automation, Selenium with Python, ETL testing, TOSCA Automation, Performance testing, Java SDET and DVOPS profile.
   

  

 A day in the life of an Infoscion
   

  

* As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to actively aid the consulting team in different phases of the project including problem definition, effort estimation, diagnosis, solution generation and design and deployment
* You will explore the alternatives to the recommended solutions based on research that includes literature surveys, information available in public domains, vendor evaluation information, etc. and build POCs
* You will create requirement specifications from the business needs, define the to\\-be\\-processes and detailed functional designs based on requirements.
* You will support configuring solution requirements on the products; understand if any issues, diagnose the root\\-cause of such issues, seek clarifications, and then identify and shortlist solution alternatives
* You will also contribute to unit\\-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!A day in the life of an Infoscion
* As part of the Infosys testing team, your primary role would be to anchor testing requirements, develop test strategy, track \\& monitor project plans, review test plans, test cases and test scripts.
* You will develop project quality plans, validate defective prevention plans to deliver effective testing solutions for clients.
* You will ensure right test environment is available and provide necessary review feedback for test data setup to ensure timely commencement of test execution
* You will validate "go live" activities such as production verification to ensure that the application runs in the production environment without any issues.
* In addition, you will mentor the team and provide regular feedback and coaching to help them continually improve their performance If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!

 Primary requirement and skills: Our team is looking for someone having a good understanding of Java, J2EE and Rest based services to build scalable solutions.  Sr. Software Engineer \\- Salesforce Job
   

  

 Date: Dec 28, 2025
   

  

 Job Requisition Id: 63060
   

  

 Location:
   

  

 Bangalore, KA, IN Bangalore, KA, IN
   

  

 YASH Technologies is a leading technology integrator specializing in helping clients reimagine operating models, enhance competitiveness, optimize costs, foster exceptional stakeholder experiences, and drive business transformation.
   

  

 At YASH, we’re a cluster of the brightest stars working with cutting\\-edge technologies. Our purpose is anchored in a single truth – bringing real positive changes in an increasingly virtual world and it drives us beyond generational gaps and disruptions of the future.
   

  

**We are looking forward to hire Sales Cloud Professionals in the following areas :**
****Job Description:****
**Job Opportunity: Salesforce Developer**
**Experience: 5–6 years**
****Key Responsibilities :****
* Design and develop custom Salesforce solutions across Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and Experience Cloud to support sales and service processes, as well as external portal experiences.
* Build and customize Lightning Web Components (LWC), Apex classes, triggers, Flows, Approval Process and REST APIs to meet complex business requirements.
* Develop and configure Sales Cloud features such as opportunity management, lead routing, approval processes, sales automation, and dashboards.
* Integrate Salesforce with third\\-party systems (e.g., ERP) using APIs or middleware platforms (e.g., Boomi, SAP PI, BW).
* Ensure adherence to Salesforce development best practices, including code reviews, security standards, and change management processes.
* Support system testing, performance tuning, and deployment activities in development and production environments.
* Provide ongoing support, troubleshooting, and enhancements for existing applications and user\\-reported issues.


****Qualifications****
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field; relevant work experience may be considered in lieu of a degree.
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on Salesforce development experience, with expertise in Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and Experience Cloud.
* Proficient in Apex, Lightning Web Components (LWC), SOQL/SOSL, Visualforce, and Flow Builder.
* Strong knowledge of Sales Cloud capabilities, including lead/opportunity management, automation rules, and analytics.
* Knowledge of Salesforce API integration and authentication methods (REST/SOAP, Named Credentials, OAuth).
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and version control tools (e.g., Git, Copado, Gearset).
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.


****Good To Have:****
* Exposure to Einstein AI and Field Service Lightning (FSL).


 At YASH, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. We leverage career\\-oriented skilling models and optimize our collective intelligence aided with technology for continuous learning, unlearning, and relearning at a rapid pace and scale.
   

  

**Our Hyperlearning workplace is grounded upon four principles**
* Flexible work arrangements, Free spirit, and emotional positivity
* Agile self\\-determination, trust, transparency, and open collaboration
* All Support needed for the realization of business goals,
* Stable employment with a great atmosphere and ethical corporate culture

title: Performance Engineering
description:
**Job Description**
 Value added Service \\[Acceptance Solutions]is a Product Development (PD) Group within the Technology Team. This group is responsible for building leading edge full\\-service Payment Solutions for our customers by combining global payment processing, fraud management, payment security and reporting systems. We are a group of bright, motivated engineers and technical managers excited about building the next generation of Payment products that will drive e\\-Commerce, mobile\\-Commerce as well as POS businesses for our customers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Accountable for creating application and infrastructure performance plans/models for a highly scalable, low\\-latency, highly\\-available and high\\-throughput payment processing system.
* Work with the architects and development team to ensure proper metrics instrumentation done in software components, to help facilitate real time and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring.
* Hands on experience in Unix/Linux OS environments and operating system internals, file systems, disk/storage and networking protocols System internals. Having working knowledge with VMs and Containers.
* Expert knowledge and strong experience using tools, Loadrunner/Jmeter,. etc. and understanding of APM solutions like Appdynamics, dynatrace, OPNET,. etc
* Coding Knowledge in programming languages like Java/Python and scripting languages is must
* Evaluate, develop and execute load test tools to stress the limits of most critical payment applications.
* Understand and performance test the APIs, abstractions and integration patterns to solve challenging distributed computing problems.
* Should have experience in defining Performance Strategy and reporting performance baselines required to certify Go\\-Lives. Should have strong experience in handling multiple tasks and stakeholders
* Should be well versed in documenting the steps performed during course of performance tests cycle including performance test scripts used
* Should be able to able to look at the code and suggest optimization techniques.
* Should have ability to work independently and be a team player.
* Actively contribute to capacity planning and disaster recovery exercises.
* Support in triaging and troubleshooting of issues related to performance degradation incidents in production environment
* Monitor application performance, optimize performance bottlenecks and usage to create an application capacity model.
* Help optimizing system components such as CPU/Memory/Disk/Network \\& OS/Application software for maximizing the computer resources utilization.


**Requirements**
**Qualifications**
* Bachelors and/or Masters degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required
* 3 to 5 years of hands\\-on experience in Performance Engineering, Tuning, analysis or applications program development.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office
